def process_queries(N, Q, A, queries):

    class Ftree:

        def __init__(self, N):
            self.st = [0] * (N + 1)
            self.n = N

        def Update(self, l, r, diff):
            while l <= self.n:
                self.st[l] += diff
                l += l & -l
            r -= 1
            while r <= self.n:
                self.st[r] -= diff
                r += r & -r

        def Query(self, i):
            sum = 0
            while i > 0:
                sum += self.st[i]
                i -= i & -i
            return sum
    A.insert(0, 0)
    b1 = Ftree(N)
    b2 = Ftree(N)
    b3 = Ftree(N)
    results = []
    for q in queries:
        if q[0] == 1:
            L = q[1]
            R = q[2]
            X = q[3]
            y = X - L
            b1.Update(L, R, y ** 2)
            b2.Update(L, R, 2 * y)
            b3.Update(L, R, 1)
        elif q[0] == 2:
            i = q[1]
            result = A[i] + b1.Query(i) + b2.Query(i) * i + b3.Query(i) * i * i
            results.append(result)
    return results
